lyrics:
You Should Be Dancing Lyrics[Verse 1]
My baby moves at midnight
Goes right on 'till the dawn
My woman, take me higher
My woman, keep me warm

[Chorus]
Whatcha doin' on your bed on your back? Hey!
Whatcha doin' on your bed on your back? Hey!
You should be dancing, yeah
Dancing, yeah

[Verse 2]
She's juicy and she's trouble
She gets it to me good
My woman, give me power
Go right down to my blood
[Chorus]
Whatcha doin' on your bed on your back? Hey!
Whatcha doin' on your bed on your back? Hey!
You should be dancing, yeah
Dancing, yeah
Whatcha doin' on your bed on your back?
Whatcha doin' on your bed on your back? Hey!
You should be dancing, yeah
Dancing, yeah

[Instrumental Solo]

[Verse 1]
My baby moves at midnight, yeah
Goes right on 'till the dawn, yeah
My woman takes me higher
My woman, keep me warm

[Chorus]
What you doin' on your bed on your back?
What you doin' on your bed on your back?
You should be dancing, yeah
Dancing, yeah

[Chorus]
Whatcha doin' on your bed on your back? Hey!
Whatcha doin' on your bed on your back? Hey!
You should be dancing, yeah
Dancing, yeah
Whatcha doin' on your back? (Hey, hey)
Whatcha doin' on your back? Hey!
You should be dancing, yeah
Dancing, yeah
[Short Break]

[Outro]
You should be dancing, yeah
You should be dancing, yeah
You should be dancing, yeah
You should be dancing, yeah
You should be dancing, yeah
You should be dancing, yeah
You should be dancing, yeah
You should be dancing, yeah6Embed
